TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HatchBrush extends System.Drawing.Brush
Public NotInheritable Class HatchBrush Inherits Brush
public ref class HatchBrush sealed : System::Drawing::Brush

summary.span: 使用規劃樣式、前景色彩和背景色彩來定義矩形筆刷。

span.span: Defines a rectangular brush with a hatch style, a foreground color, and a background color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從兩個色彩來進行規劃圖樣： 所定義的其中一個，這會填滿背景和其中所定義的背景上形成圖樣的格線屬性。A hatch pattern is made from two colors: one defined by the , which fills the background and one for the lines that form the pattern over the background defined by the property. 屬性會定義何種模式具有筆刷和可為任何值列舉型別。The property defines what type of pattern the brush has and can be any value from the enumeration. 有多個五十個中的項目列舉型別。There are more than fifty elements in the enumeration. 下圖顯示以水平影線圖樣填滿橢圓形。The following illustration shows an ellipse filled with a horizontal hatch pattern. ![影線圖樣](~/add/media/hatch1.png "影線圖樣")![Hatch Pattern](~/add/media/hatch1.png "Hatch Pattern") ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立上圖所示。The following example shows how to create the shown in the previous illustration. [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.UsingABrush#41](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.UsingABrush/CS/Class1.cs#41)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.UsingABrush#41](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.UsingABrush/VB/Class1.vb#41)]

summary.span: 使用指定的 列舉型別和前景色彩，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified enumeration and foreground color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始化的背景色彩為黑色。The background color is initialized to black.
